Featured-image: 8112-cherry-red-two-piece-mermaid-evening-gown_p.jpg

Description: This two piece gown is sexy and chic. Sparkling jewel and bead cover the V-neck bodice with an open back and a scalloped edge. The short sleeves add a chic touch to the two piece element. The high waisted skirt allows for a slimming look. Form fitting mermaid style skirt hemline adds  a sense of elegance.
